Class DegreeScorer<V>

java.lang.Object

V - the vertex type
All Implemented Interfaces:
VertexScorer<V,Integer>
public class DegreeScorer<V>
extends Object
implements VertexScorer<V,Integer>

Assigns a score to each vertex equal to its degree.
